name.baseName: Compound fertilizer ; Phosphate ore, phosphoric acid, sulfuric acid, ammonia, potassium chloride, potassium sulfate, etc. ; Slurry method ; All sizes; NESPS2
复混肥料 ; 磷矿、磷酸、硫酸、氨、氯化钾、硫酸钾等 ; 料浆法 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程用于生产复混肥料，这涉及通过浆料法混合硫酸、磷酸、氨、磷矿、氯化钾、硫酸钾等原材料。该过程适用于农业应用的所有规模生产。详细说明的末端治理技术专门用于处理肥料制造过程中产生的各种污染物，包括废水和废气，确保符合环境标准。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,四级代码2624文件，在完整版文件中第4111页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution arsenicisPhysical treatment + chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management79
污染物指标总砷的末端治理技术是物理处理法+化学处理法，其效率为79，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总砷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总砷
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisVenturi + two-stage spray tower + demisting，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management42
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是文丘里+两级喷淋塔+除雾，其效率为42，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisVenturi + one-stage spray tower + demisting，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management38
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是文丘里+一级喷淋塔+除雾，其效率为38，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution ammoniaisVenturi + two-stage spray tower + demisting，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99
污染物指标氨的末端治理技术是文丘里+两级喷淋塔+除雾，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氨，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isCyclone dust removal + bag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.2
